resources.string: %s favorited a tweet you were tagged in
%1$s and %2$s favorited a tweet you were tagged in
%s favorited a tweet you were mentioned in
%1$s and %2$s favorited a tweet you were mentioned in
%s liked a tweet you were tagged in
%1$s and %2$s liked a tweet you were tagged in
%s liked a tweet you were mentioned in
%1$s and %2$s liked a tweet you were mentioned in
%1$s and %2$s added you to their lists
%s retweeted a tweet you were tagged in
%1$s and %2$s retweeted a tweet you were tagged in
%s retweeted a tweet you were mentioned in
%1$s and %2$s retweeted a tweet you were mentioned in
Twidere will restart to apply settings.
Twidere will quit to apply settings.
Disable media preview on metered network
Block %s? This user won\'t be able to follow you, mention you or send you direct messages.
Due to Twitter\'s limitation to third party twitter apps, Twidere has no access to replies to a tweet, there\'s no guarantee that Twidere can load all replies to a tweet.
Clear all tweets, profiles, messages. Your account credentials won\'t be lost.
Replaces Google Now shortcut for Compose screen
If you didn\'t find your name, please tell our project account.
Host mapping like /etc/hosts, but does not require any additional permissions.
These settings only apply to newly logged-in accounts
Delete all messages of this conversation?
Delete list %s? This can\'t be undone.
Delete saved search \"%s\"? You can re-save this search later.
Display sensitive contents without notice in timeline
Set DNS Server for network requests.
Your unsent tweets will save here
Please check your system date & time settings.
This device is not compatible with Twidere, upgrade to latest Android OS is recommended.\nYou can send information below to help me report this issue to device manufacturer.
Attach media to DM is not supported
Media uploader not found, maybe it was uninstalled.
Twitter\'s rate limit exceeded, please retry %s
Tweet shortener not found, maybe it was uninstalled.
Your application can\'t access this resource.
No direct message permission, check your Twitter application permission setting.
Error: Unknown error, this is probably a bug.
Sync data with Dropbox, Google Drive etc
Support Twidere and get enhanced features
Or buy features pack to get all features (including features in future releases)
If you\'ve already purchased enhanced features, you can use \'Restore\' to restore purchase.
Enable to make images load faster, disable this if some image can\'t be displayed.

These will be filtered in Twidere:
 ·User's tweets
 ·Tweets mentioning this user
 ·Retweets/Quotes of this user
Display notifications from users you follow only.

NEVER change these settings if you don't know what it is, or it'll:
 * Kill your cat
 * Launch nuclear weapons in North Korea
 * Turn ALL Mahou Shoujo into Majo
 * Destroy the universe
Swipe from screen edge to open accounts dashboard.
Will be sent as quote because mention to tweet author was removed. Why?
Must start with a letter and can consist only letters, numbers, \"-\", or \"_\".
Put the compose button on the left.
Useful if you prefer to read from bottom to top
Retype the email address associated with your Twitter account.
Retype the phone number associated with your Twitter account.
Check your phone for a PIN code and enter it to log in.
Accept login verification request from Twitter app, once you approved the request, click OK.
This account will be deleted from Twidere.
[DOMAIN]: Twitter API domain.\nExample: https://[DOMAIN].twitter.com/ will be replaced to https://api.twitter.com/.
Twidere has crashed. Send a bug report to help me solve this issue.
Enable auto refresh to get new tweets automatically?
Schedule media with Buffer is not yet supported
Some account data are corrupted, Twidere will remove those accounts to prevent crash.
This tweet will be sent as a message to %1$s, continue? Converting to a normal tweet uses an extra character.
Twidere needs location permission for adding location to tweets.
Twidere needs storage permission for saving media.
Twidere needs storage permission for sharing media to some apps.
Pin this tweet? This will replace previously pinned tweet.
Enable promotions to use all enhanced features for free, we promise not to disturb you!
Twitter makes tweet author always be mentioned in a reply. If tweet author was removed, Twidere will send this reply as a quote to preserve context.
Connect to Buffer to schedule tweets even in offline
Twidere is now connected to Buffer
Connect Twidere with network storage to sync data
Enable promotions to use all enhanced features for free!
Permission required to delete taken photo/video
An error occurred, please try again
Installation on SD card is not supported, accounts may get lost after reboot.
Here\'s a little present for you, find it in your system settings :)
Only available when streaming is on, and not 100% reliable.
Storage permission is needed to save media
Storage permission is needed to select file
Some apps require storage permission to share media
TLS error, please check your clock or proxy settings
Mute %s? You will no longer see tweets from this user while keep following this user.
Open profile and media in new task
Updates like new tweets in home timeline
%1$s and %2$d others sent you %3$d direct messages.
Read tweets and some cached content
Application can shorten tweet for Twidere, so it can access your tweet to send.
Application can sync read position for Twidere, so it can access your read position.
Application can upload media for Twidere, so it can access media in your tweet to send.
You are opening a link in a direct message, which might lead you to a phishing site.\n\nCheck the site address twice before providing any personal information.
Warn you when are trying to open a possibly phishing link in a direct message.
Open profile and media in new task
Disallow other apps to get your name by reading accounts, improves privacy.
Enable for faster refresh interval, increases power usage on Android 5.0+
Stop auto refresh when battery is low
Press HOME instead of BACK to keep streaming open
Open links with in-app browser (Powered by Chrome)
Upper limit of items stored in databases for each account, set to a smaller value to save space and increase loading speed.
Show confirmation before favoriting a tweet
Show confirmation before liking a tweet
Preload media only on free networks like Wi-Fi
Streaming only on free networks like Wi-Fi
Now you can set location separately in tab settings.
Use proxy for all network requests.
This tweet is protected.\n\nProtected users usually don\'t want their tweets to be shared publicly.
Jump to latest tweet after refreshing
Refresh timeline and mentions after sending a tweet.
Refresh timeline and mentions on start.
Remember list/tab position before closing Twidere
Report %s for spam? You\'ll also block this user.
Try recover from network issue automatically
Use same URL for OAuth signing
Perhaps you already saved this search
This tweet may have sensitive content, continue?

Twidere is reaching token limit, you will have to create an app at https://apps.twitter.com/ and paste consumer key and secret below.\nIf you continue using default key, you may not be able to sign in.
Error while signing in, you may need to use browser sign in method. (This will ignore custom API settings during sign in)
Tweet not sent, and saved to drafts.
Full interactions available only when streaming enabled
Use TCP Protocol to make DNS requests to avoid DNS spoofing.
Unfollow %s? You will no longer see tweets from this user.
Unsubscribe from list \"%s\"? You can re-subscribe to this list later.
Unsupported login verification type %1$s, please report to support account.
You need to send follow request to this protected user to see tweets
